import React from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import * as CartActions from '../../store/modules/cart/actions'; import {bindActionCreators} from 'redux'; import { Container, ProductTable,Total } from './styles'; import {MdRemoveCircleOutline, MdAddCircleOutline,MdDelete } from 'react-icons/md' function Cart({cart,removeFromCart, updateAmount}){ function increment(id){ } function decrement(id){ } return ( PRODUTO QTD Subtotal {cart.map(product=>( {product.title} {product.priceFormatted}
R$259,80 ))}
TOTAL R$1920,28
); } const mapStateToProps = state =>({ cart: state.cart, }) const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => bindActionCreators(CartActions,dispatch); export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Cart);
